xwikidoc.name: EventTranslations

xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields Event.Code.EventClass_title=Title Event.Code.EventClass_location=Location Event.Code.EventClass_startDate=Start date Event.Code.EventClass_endDate=End date Event.Code.EventClass_description=Description Event.Code.EventClass_responsible=Responsible Event.Code.EventClass_participants=Participants Event.Code.EventClass_conferenceURL=Conference URL Event.Code.EventClass_abstractDeadline=Abstract deadline Event.Code.EventClass_approvalBy=Approval by Event.Code.EventClass_approvalBy_both=WG & SAPO Event.Code.EventClass_approvalBy_sapo=SAPO Event.Code.EventClass_approvalBy_swg=WG Event.Code.EventClass_hasProceedings=Has proceedings Event.Code.EventClass_proceedingsDeadline=Proceedings deadline Event.Code.EventClass_bannerMessage=Banner message for contribution pages
# Sheet keys event.sheet.description=This page controls how Event pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. event.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected Event object. event.sheet.noFields=The Event application doesn't have any fields to display. event.sheet.presentations=Contributions event.sheet.createPresentation.section_title=Add new contribution to event.sheet.createPresentation.title=Contribution title event.sheet.createPresentation.title.hint=Title of the talk or poster. Must be unique to this conference. event.sheet.createPresentation.title.placeholder=The very catchy title of my talk or poster. event.sheet.createPresentation.create=Add contribution
# WebHome keys event.title=Conferences
# Event creation keys event.createEvent.section_title=Add new conference event.createEvent.title=Conference name event.createEvent.title.hint=Globally unique conference name, preferably including year or sequential number for recurrent conferences. event.createEvent.title.placeholder=MyCONF event.createEvent.create=Add conference
# Live table generic keys event.livetable.doc.title=Page Title event.livetable.doc.name=Page Name event.livetable.doc.space=Space event.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name event.livetable.doc.location=Location event.livetable.doc.author=Last Author event.livetable.doc.creator=Creator event.livetable.doc.date=Date event.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation Date event.livetable._avatar=Avatar event.livetable._images=Images event.livetable._attachments=Attachments event.livetable._actions=Actions event.livetable._actions.edit=Edit event.livetable._actions.delete=Delete event.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys event.livetable.title=Title event.livetable.location=Location event.livetable.startDate=Start date event.livetable.endDate=End date event.livetable.description=Description event.livetable.responsible=Responsible event.livetable.participants=Participants event.livetable.abstractDeadline=Abs deadline
# Other keys event.entry.name=Conference
# Deprecated keys event.dataSpace.title=Data
